name: Keto Pork Belly Cracklins
author: Steve Cowherd
summary: These cracklins are a sinful keto snack. Beware if you like pork belly, these are addictive... I recommend cooking outdoors if at all possible. Please do not leave unattended.
directions: Place pork belly in the freezer until partially frozen, about 45 minutes; this will make cubing easier
Fill a 5-quart cast iron pot 1/4 of the way with water
Add 1 teaspoon Cajun seasoning and bring water to a roaring boil
Cook until all of the water evaporates and fat renders from the pork, about 20 minutes
Cover pot once fat starts to sizzle and pop; cook and stir until cracklins are golden brown and crisp, about 15 minutes
